title: How rare is Victorious Jarvan IV
body: never seen this skin in my 5 seasons of playing , how rare?

replies.body: Rare enough that most people who have it, have probably stopped playing league by now.
I have it and I think its pretty cool that people tell you every match how rare it is and go "Wow its season 1 reward"almost every game.{{champion:59}}
Hey, add me in-game. I'm organizing a 5 vic skin match and am missing 1 skin. You can be it!
Victorious skins prior to the OCE server are extremely rare due to not many players committing their time to 190-210 ping ranked games.

Do you play alot of Jarvan?

I've always wanted a Nasus Riot Skin, couldn't find it.

Stopped playing for a year, came back and what you know.

Riot gave me the skin.

I guess you can play alot of Jarvan in game, mention the skin in matches.  Never know a RIOT Santa Clause could be listening.
Victorious Jarvin was a reward for getting to gold in like season 2

You should request for one from RIOT, see if they hook you up with one.

GL!
They wont. There are just some skins that Riot will *never* give out to players like that, such as the Victorious skin line (since they're ranked rewards).
Jarv was season 1, janna was season 2
i dont play that much but feel free to add me if you want to see the skin unfortunately you must be in NA server though :S

Victorious Jarvan was given to players who reached GOLD in season 1.

Season 2 was Janna ( I has it :D )
I wouldn't really worry about seeing it, as someone who has it, the skin is underwhelming,

Never seen it

Seen pax tf and king rammus
